original: Milindapañha
analyzed: milindapañha

original: Opammakathāpañha
analyzed: opamma kathā pañha

original: Pathavīvagga
analyzed: pathavīvagga

original: 4. Vāyuṅgapañha
analyzed: vāyuṅgapañha

original: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī’ti yaṁ vadesi, katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbānī”ti?
analyzed: bhante nāgasena vāyussa pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti yam vadesi katamāni tāni pañca aṅgāni gahetabbāni iti

original: “Yathā, mahārāja, vāyu supupphitavanasaṇḍantaraṁ abhivāyati;
analyzed: yathā mahā rāja vāyu su pupphita vana saṇḍantaram abhivāyati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vimuttivarakusumapupphitārammaṇavanantare ramitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena vimutti vara kusuma pupphita ārammaṇa vana antare

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyussa paṭhamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja vāyussa paṭhamam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, vāyu dharaṇīruhapādapagaṇe mathayati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja vāyu dharaṇīruha pādapa gaṇe mathayati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena vanantaragatena saṅkhāre vicinantena kilesā mathayitabbā.
analyzed: evam eva khalu mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena saṅkhāre vicinantena kilesāḥ mathayitabbā

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyussa dutiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: ida mahā rāja vāyussa dutiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, vāyu ākāse carati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja vāyu ākāse carati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena lokuttaradhammesu mānasaṁ sañcārayitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena lokuttara dhammesu mānasam

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyussa tatiyaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja vāyussa tatiyam aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, vāyu gandhaṁ anubhavati;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja vāyu gandham anubhavati

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena attano sīlavarasurabhigandho anubhavitabbo.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena attano sīla vara surabhi gandhaḥ anubhavitabbo

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyussa catutthaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja vāyussa catuttham aṅgam

original: Puna caparaṁ, mahārāja, vāyu nirālayo aniketavāsī;
analyzed: puna capara mahā rāja vāyu nirālayaḥ aniketa vāsī

original: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena nirālayamaniketamasanthavena sabbattha vimuttena bhavitabbaṁ.
analyzed: evam eva kho mahā rāja yoginā yogāvacarena nirālayam aniketam asanthavena sabbattha vimuttena bhavitabba

original: Idaṁ, mahārāja, vāyussa pañcamaṁ aṅgaṁ gahetabbaṁ.
analyzed: idam mahā rāja vāyussa pañcamam aṅgam

original: Bhāsitampetaṁ, mahārāja, bhagavatā devātidevena suttanipāte—
analyzed: mahā rāja bhagavatā devātidevena sutta nipāte

original: ‘Santhavāto bhayaṁ jātaṁ,
analyzed: santhavātaḥ bhayam jāta

original: niketā jāyate rajo;
analyzed: niketā jāyate rajaḥ

original: Aniketamasanthavaṁ,
analyzed: aniketam asanthava

original: etaṁ ve munidassanan’”ti.
analyzed: etam ve

original: Vāyuṅgapañho catuttho.
analyzed: vāyuṅgapañho catuttho
